title: Bride and Prejudice's 'mother-in-law from hell' Laurelle QUITS the show
text:
Bride and Prejudice's 'mother-in-law from hell' Laurelle sensationally quit the series on Monday night.

The mean mum said that she was 'done' with the social experiment after growing fed-up with son Nathan's relationship with Gold Coast model Codie Lea.

Before meeting with the couple, Laurelle sat down for an intense therapy session with the show's resident psychologist, Leeanne Hall.

'I am done!' Bride and Prejudice's 'mother-in-law from hell' Laurelle sensationally quit the series on Monday night

The mum admitted that she was jealous of Nathan and Codie Lea's relationship, which caused her to break down in tears.

'I can't salvage this, it's like we're going round and round and round,' she cried.

'Nothing I can do or say will ever change the way they think and feel about me.'

Laurelle then started to attack Codie Lea again, claiming that the 21-year-old is disrespectful and treats her 'like s**t'.

'I would not treat a mongrel dog the way they treat me,' she raged.

'I've had enough!' she continued. 'I don't know how much more I can take... I feel like I'm s**t under their feet.'

When Nathan and Codie Lea arrived, Laurelle read from a letter and announced that she was leaving the experiment.

'I have a lot of loved ones at home that accept me for who I am, for what I am, and will never ever disrespect me the way you two do,' Laurelle snapped at the young couple

'If you don't like who I am, then don't be in my life,' she said angrily as she read from the letter.

'I have a lot of loved ones at home that accept me for who I am, for what I am, and will never ever disrespect me the way you two do.'

She finished: 'As of now, I am walking away and I hope you can live with the fact that your mother will not be in your life... I am done!'
